scripts.format: git diff --name-only HEAD --diff-filter=ACMR | xargs -r prettier --write --ignore-unknown --log-level silent
scripts.pub: pnpm --filter ralph publish && pnpm --filter ralph-ui publish
scripts.test: pnpm --filter ralph-shared test && pnpm --filter ralph test && pnpm --filter ralph-ui test
scripts.version-major: pnpm version major --no-git-tag-version && pnpm -r exec pnpm version major --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version-minor: pnpm version minor --no-git-tag-version && pnpm -r exec pnpm version minor --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version-patch: pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm -r exec pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version
